Html:
thanks for this cool utility.

i have authored both, regular unit tests and also coded ui tests with vs 2010 (premium edition) and vs 2012 (premium edition).
i'm running the tests through mstest.exe

i have a couple of tests that are temporarily disabled through [Ignore] attribute.
unfortunately they don't get listed in the html report.
i can see the html report has counters for "Inconclusive" and "TestsIgnored", but both are having a value of "0" in my case.

i have tried with both versions of trx2html: 0.7.2 and 0.7.3 .
no luck so far.


i then took a look at the *.trx itself: notExecuted="0" notRunnable="0" inconclusive="0" aborted="0".
so the trx itself does not list any skipped / disabled tests?

mstest.exe does write some message to the console output, though:
Warning: The disabled test 'TestMethod3' was removed from the test run.

am i missing a particular configuration switch to also log the skipped tests?

update:
maybe this question will get answered on MS connect:
https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/779743/
